channel.title: Runeserver+Compiler not working, full details inside
channel.description:
Okay i need some help with my compiler. It compiles but i wont run the Server. And i dont know if it is my Variables or My compile+run.bat
First i will you you Information about my java and such.
My java Version is: [Code] Sun Java. JDK Version 1.6.0 [/code]
This is The Path to my bin folder: [Code] F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin [Code]
These Are my variables set:
Classpath: [Code] ;F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\;. [/Code]
PATH: [Code] F:\Server;F:\Server\php;F:\Windows\System32 [/Code]
Now This is what is wrong, The compiler Compiles my Server, It try's to restart it. (says failed becouse it isnt on) And when it Try's to runserver it shows this Error. [Code] Current Status: Compliling Sever (Done) Restarting Sever (Failed) Running Sever (In Progress)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
This is The Compiler i am using: [Code] @echo off
:menu title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net cls echo **************************************** echo * LagexPSC AIO Complier * echo * http://psc.lagex.net * echo **************************************** echo. echo Welcome, echo. echo Use the following Commands: echo + all - Use this to End Sever, Complie and Run. echo + links - Shows a few helpful links. echo + copyright - Copyright info. echo + main - Return back here echo + about - About this AIO. echo + exit - Exit LagexPSC Complier. echo. echo. set /p c=Command: if %c%==exit goto exit if %c%==links goto links if %c%==about goto about if %c%==main goto main if %c%==all goto all if %c%==copyright goto copyright pause :exit cls exit :all cls echo. echo Current Status: echo Compliling Sever (-- %) echo. echo. echo. title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net - All "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto all2 :all2 cls echo. echo Current Status: echo Compliling Sever (Done) echo Restarting Sever (-- %) echo. echo. echo. title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net - All tskill java /a pause goto all3 :all3 cls echo. echo Current Status: echo Compliling Sever (Done) echo Restarting Sever (Failed) echo Running Sever (In Progress) echo. echo. echo. title Running Sever set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause goto menu
:copyright cls echo Copyright (c) 2007 Reece Woods. echo Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document echo under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.2 echo or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; echo A copy of the license is included in the section entitled "GNU echo Free Documentation License". echo. echo. echo. echo. echo. echo. echo All Newer Releases of this Software echo (Modifications) Must contain some form of Credits and echo Must contain this copyright information echo The maximum fine and or sentence is 5 Years. echo More information on this lincense can be found echo Here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License echo (c) echo http://psc.lagex.net pause goto menu
:about cls echo This Sever AIO (All in one) echo Was created By Wonderguy6 / Doc.Booty echo And is Copyrighted (c) 2007 - 2008 echo More info on Copyright can be found by echo Typing copyright on the main menu. echo. echo. echo. pause goto menu
:links cls echo Links - All links can be submitted to Wonderguy6 echo At http://psc.lagex.net echo. echo. echo Private Severs (3) echo http://moparisthebest.com - A Community for Private severs echo http://psc.lagex.net - Another community for Private severs echo http://rune-server.org - Yet another Private sever communtiy. echo. echo. echo Others (2) echo http://www.lagex.net - A Programming Commuity echo http://www.moparisthebest.com - Runescape Cheating Community echo. echo pause goto menu [/Code]
Please do not send my Mod Tharoks compiler becouse that one never worked for me.
~Joery~[/code][/code]

item.title: Runeserver+Compiler not working, full details inside
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

change

F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin
;F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\;.

to

F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
;F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\;.

should work then

EDIT:
use this

@echo off COLOR 0c title yourserver Compile + Run "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Runeserver+Compiler not working, full details inside
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

Current Status:
Compliling Sever (Done)
Restarting Sever (Failed)
Running Sever (In Progress)

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n
umber in .class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)

…
thats a java error not a compiler one

edit —

well the error is “bad version number in .class file”

and it only points to Sun’s java files, so my best guess is that you need to reinstall java…

Read full topic

item.title: Runeserver+Compiler not working, full details inside
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Okay i need some help with my compiler.
It compiles but i wont run the Server.
And i dont know if it is my Variables or My compile+run.bat

First i will you you Information about my java and such.

My java Version is:

Sun Java. JDK Version 1.6.0

This is The Path to my bin folder:

[Code]
F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

[Code]

These Are my variables set:

Classpath:

;F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\;.

PATH:

F:\Server;F:\Server\php;F:\Windows\System32

Now This is what is wrong,
The compiler Compiles my Server,
It try’s to restart it. (says failed becouse it isnt on)
And when it Try’s to runserver it shows this Error.

Current Status:
Compliling Sever (Done)
Restarting Sever (Failed)
Running Sever (In Progress)



Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n
umber in .class file
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .

This is The Compiler i am using:

@echo off

:menu
title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net
cls
echo ****************************************
echo *        LagexPSC AIO Complier         *
echo *        http://psc.lagex.net          *
echo ****************************************
echo.
echo Welcome, 
echo.
echo Use the following Commands:
echo + all - Use this to End Sever, Complie and Run.
echo + links - Shows a few helpful links.
echo + copyright - Copyright info.
echo + main - Return back here
echo + about - About this AIO. 
echo + exit - Exit LagexPSC Complier.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Command:
if %c%==exit goto exit
if %c%==links goto links
if %c%==about goto about
if %c%==main goto main
if %c%==all goto all
if %c%==copyright goto copyright
pause
:exit
cls
exit
:all
cls
echo.
echo Current Status:
echo Compliling Sever (-- %)
echo.
echo. 
echo. 
title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net - All
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause
goto all2
:all2
cls
echo.
echo Current Status:
echo Compliling Sever (Done)                
echo Restarting Sever (-- %)		
echo.
echo.
echo.  
title LagexPSC - Perfect Complier - http://psc.lagex.net - All
tskill java /a
pause
goto all3
:all3
cls
echo.
echo Current Status:			
echo Compliling Sever (Done)                
echo Restarting Sever (Failed)		
echo Running Sever (In Progress)		
echo.
echo.
echo.  
title Running Sever
set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe"
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
goto menu

:copyright
cls
echo Copyright (c) 2007 Reece Woods.
echo Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document
echo under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.2
echo or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation;
echo A copy of the license is included in the section entitled "GNU
echo Free Documentation License".
echo.
echo.
echo.
echo.
echo.
echo.
echo All Newer Releases of this Software
echo (Modifications) Must contain some form of Credits and
echo Must contain this copyright information
echo The maximum fine and or sentence is 5 Years.
echo More information on this lincense can be found
echo Here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License
echo (c)
echo http://psc.lagex.net
pause
goto menu

:about
cls
echo This Sever AIO (All in one)
echo Was created By Wonderguy6 / Doc.Booty
echo And is Copyrighted (c) 2007 - 2008
echo More info on Copyright can be found by
echo Typing copyright on the main menu.
echo.
echo.
echo.
pause
goto menu

:links
cls
echo Links - All links can be submitted to Wonderguy6
echo At http://psc.lagex.net
echo.
echo.
echo Private Severs (3)
echo http://moparisthebest.com - A Community for Private severs
echo http://psc.lagex.net - Another community for Private severs
echo http://rune-server.org - Yet another Private sever communtiy.
echo.
echo.
echo Others (2)
echo http://www.lagex.net - A Programming Commuity
echo http://www.moparisthebest.com - Runescape Cheating Community
echo.
echo
pause
goto menu

Please do not send my Mod Tharoks compiler becouse that one never worked for me.

~Joery~[/code][/code]
